titleInfo.title: Excerpt 7 from oral history interview with James Stephen Turner, 2006 June 21

physicalDescription.note: Excerpted from: NBLTurner digital recording converted from wav to mp3 format in 2006.

location.physicalLocation: Special Collections Division of the Nashville Public Library, 615 Church Street, Nashville, Tennessee, 37219

mods.abstract: An excerpt from an oral history interview with Nashville business and civic leader James Stephen (Steve) Turner, conducted on 21 June 2006 by Andrea Blackman as part of the Nashville Public Library's Nashville Business Leaders Oral History Project: The Turner Interviews. Turner discusses what it means to be an entrepreneur and the difficulty of being successful in business today. The complete interview, as well as an index, is available in the repository.

titleInfo.title: Nashville Business Leaders Oral History Project

mods.accessCondition: U.S. and international copyright laws protect this digital content, which is provided for educational purposes only and may not be downloaded, reproduced, or distributed for any other purpose without written permission. Please contact the Special Collections Division of the Nashville Public Library, 615 Church Street, Nashville, Tennessee, 37219. Telephone (615) 862-5782.
